title: Ninth Circuit Again Allows Trump to Retain Control of CA Guard
summary: Three-judge panel (2 Trump, 1 Biden appointees) unanimously extends stay allowing Trump control of 4,000 CA Guard troops. Court applies 'highly deferential' standard under Title 10, rejects claim this is political question. Trump posts 'BIG WIN' while case proceeds on merits.
citations: Reuters — U.S. court lets Trump retain control of California National Guard for now (Jun 20, 2025): https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-court-lets-trump-retain-control-california-national-guard-now-2025-06-20/
notes: Court rejected government claim compliance with Section 12406 is political question. Panel cited rebellion/danger of rebellion provision of Title 10. Newsom: President is not a king. Bonta: case far from over. Deployment in response to immigration raid protests. Supreme Court appeal expected.
